page.title: 19OTHER PLACES OF WORSHIP
page.content: {BAPTIST CHAPEL THE BAPTIST CHAPEL IN WESTON LANE DATES FROM 1908 BUT RECORDS SHOW THAT BAPTISTS WERE MEETING IN THE COTTAGE OPPOSITE IN 1828; THERE IS ALSO REFERENCE IN A YORKSHIREMAN'S DIARY TO BAPTISTS IN WINTERSLOW AS EARLY AS 1754. THE PRESENT MEMBERSHIP, LED BY THE REV. DANE BAKER, IS ABOUT 30. {LIFEBOAT MISSION THIS CONGREGATION WAS ORIGINALLY AN OFF-SHOOT OF THE LOCAL METHODISTS WHO BUILT THEIR OWN PLACE OF WORSHIP IN A CENTRAL POSITION IN MIDDLE WINTERSLOW IN 1891 AT A COST OF Â£100 .A NEW CHAPEL WAS BUILT IN 1980 AND THERE IS A MEMBERSHIP OF ABOUT 20.
